name: battle tank pro
description:
battle tank pro

battle tank pro is game Tank war with Funny of meme in to battlefield.

-There are start 2 types  "Start Game"  and  "Quick Game"

- 3 gamemode

- 44 tanks (allow add-on)

- 9 maps (allow add-on)

- full sound

- Control Easy

- funny

- new HUD/GUI

- more

How to play  

Choose an area that has the tank.

Control tank in fight to Victory.
